definition: the whys and the wherefores/the detailed story/root cause
root/basis/classifier for long slender objects, e.g. cigarettes, guitar strings/CL:條|条[tiao2]/radical (chemistry)
to follow/from/it is for...to/reason/cause/because of/due to/to/to leave it (to sb)/by (introduces passive verb)

sentences.english: The question is whether the dedicated have had more influence than the image- flashers .
sentences.chinese: 问题是无论如何对阅读的这种关注比图片根由影响。

sentences.english: So his strength was not known.
sentences.chinese: 这样，他力气的根由人还是不知道。

sentences.english: The root cause for the vacancy and alienation of Chinese spoken language course.
sentences.chinese: 汉语口语课程缺位与异化的深层根由。

sentences.english: Laboriously did he describe the genesis of the picnic.
sentences.chinese: 他熬费苦心地描绘了这次野餐的根由。

sentences.english: For the birth of all kinds of scientific knowledge, each has its own origin and develop mental law.
sentences.chinese: 各类科学知识的诞生，都有其自身的根由与发展规律。

sentences.english: That's probably why I have an affinity with sand.
sentences.chinese: 大概这就是我和沙子结下不解之缘的根由。

sentences.english: So the secret of his strength was not discovered.
sentences.chinese: 这样，他力气的根由人还是不知道。

sentences.english: A mountain wolf, a savage ruthless beast, mindless of past obligations.
sentences.chinese: 中山狼，无情兽，全不念当日根由。

sentences.english: The main reason lies in the misleading conception of "the average man".
sentences.chinese: 追其根由，乃是“常人”观念在教育领域的误导。

definition: to study/to examine/to probe/to study the underlying principles
variant of 緣由|缘由[yuan2 you2]
to get to the heart of the matter
to trace something to its source (idiom)
to trace sth back to its source/to get to the bottom of sth
to trace sth back to its origin
there is a reason for it/(of sth) not incidental
foundation/grounding/background/what lies at the bottom of sth/root/cause
to seek an answer/to look for an explanation/to explain/explanation
root of the trouble/cause of the ruin
